channel.title: land on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in land on Barefoot Rob

item.title: land in Okutama
item.description: 16:25 Saturday 28 November 2015 JST Lin and I went to Okutama to chill and look at some land. It’s on sale for a mere(?) $60,000… but it apparently doesn’t get much sunlight. There are plenty of hills in the area, being that it’s in the mountains, but by the time we live there, I’m sure self driving cars will be the norm. We’re on a train that goes from Okutama to Tokyo station, so it’s a single line (and we have seats), but it takes more than a few minutes to travel the distance.
